vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
περι-κᾰλύπτω,
cover all round, πολέμοιο νέφος περὶ πάντα καλύπτει [Refs 8th c.BC+]; τινὰ ἱματίοισι or ἐν ἱματίῳ, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; τὸ θνητὸν περικάλυπτε τῷ θεῷ (i.e. Διονύσῳ), i.e. get drunk, [Refs 4th c.BC+] —middle and passive, cover oneself all round, [Refs]
__II put round as a covering, αὐτῷ.. περὶ κῶμα κάλυψα put sleep as a cloak around him, [Refs 8th c.BC+]; τὸ σῶμα [ψυχῇ] [LXX+5th c.BC+] throw a veil of darkness over the deeds, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to blindfold, cover the face or eyes; to cover (with gold)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to blindfold, cover the face or eyes; to cover (with gold)
to cover round about, cover over; to cover, the face,eyes Mk. 14:65; to blindfold, Lk. 22:64; passive to be overlaid, Heb. 9:4*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: cubrir, ocultar ; vendar ; cubrir por completo (con oro)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: bao phủ; bịt (mắt); che đậy. περί (G4012) + καλύπτω (G2572)
